unnormalised: Aiyyo, Adv. Sharma is saying that under the civil code, chacha's property will be divided equally among all legal heirs, even if his will says otherwise. So basically, beta, consult a lawyer ASAP!
normalised: Aiyyo, Advocate Sharma is saying that under the civil code, chacha's property will be divided equally among all legal heirs, even if his will says otherwise. So basically, beta, consult a lawyer A-S-A-P!
